Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.camera.gallery.BaseImage
      • com.android.camera.gallery.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IImage

    public class Image
extends BaseImage
implements IImage
    The class for normal images in gallery.
